==================== 04-03-2018 ====================
* frameworks/base/ 75a9b24b234 Show 4G instead of LTE [1/2] - Added to statusbar items under the AOSP tuner instead of 2 parts - Added a category to organize things a bit - Added SettingsObserver in PSB - Hide the switch on WiFi-Only devices (thanks AICP for the idea) - Removed config that was used in overlays [Sebastian] 3a57cd1dff7 ViewConfiguration: misc changes (rev) [Sebastian] 54594475dd2 SystemUI: QS: keep emergency call only text consistent [Sebastian] * manifest/ 8fd5e23 Manifest for Android 8.1.0 Release 20 [The Android Open Source Project] d4052a9 Manifest for Android 8.1.0 Release 19 [The Android Open Source Project] * packages/apps/Galaxy/ f3d9a5c Show 4G instead of LTE switch [2/2] [Sebastian] * vendor/ota/ 23dcd46 OTA: Update gemini (02/04/2018) [Sebastian]
